item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Can you use this feature to get result sets from the stored procedure returning multiple results sets such as sp_spaceused? If so, can you show this?
item.content:encoded: Can you use this feature to get result sets from the stored procedure returning multiple results sets such as sp_spaceused? If so, can you show this?
